name: Albert Einstein
bio: Albert Einstein was a theoretical physicist known for developing the theory of relativity.

name: Marie Curie
bio: Marie Curie was a pioneering physicist and chemist, known for her research on radioactivity.
achievements: Nobel Prizes in Physics and Chemistry

name: William Shakespeare
bio: William Shakespeare is widely regarded as one of the greatest playwrights in history.

name: Leonardo da Vinci
bio: Leonardo da Vinci was a Renaissance genius known for his contributions to art, science, and anatomy.

name: Nelson Mandela
bio: Nelson Mandela was a prominent anti-apartheid revolutionary and the first President of South Africa.

name: Amelia Earhart
bio: Amelia Earhart was a pioneering aviator, becoming the first woman to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Martin Luther King Jr.
bio: Martin Luther King Jr. was a prominent leader in the American civil rights movement, advocating for equality through nonviolent protests.

name: Coco Chanel
bio: Coco Chanel revolutionized fashion and is known for her timeless designs and the creation of the Chanel brand.

name: Pablo Picasso
bio: Pablo Picasso was a prolific artist and a key figure in the development of modern art, co-founding Cubism.

name: Elon Musk
bio: Elon Musk is a visionary entrepreneur known for founding SpaceX, Tesla, and other innovative companies.
